subject: Cricket (Game)
lead_paragraph: Tillakaratne Dilshan cracked a scintillating 76, but it was Lasith Malinga’s tight bowling that led Sri Lanka to a thrilling victory against New Zealand in the Twenty20 World Cup.
snippet: Tillakaratne Dilshan cracked a scintillating 76, but it was Lasith Malinga’s tight bowling that led Sri Lanka to a thrilling victory against New Zealand in the Twenty20 World Cup.
